author: Mix
title: Meet the quarantined street photographers documenting life in ‘Red Dead Redemption 2’
description: Since the 19th century, photographers like Henri Cartier-Bresson and Joel Meyerowitz have been tirelessly roaming around to photograph life on the streets. Camera strapped in hand, these artists devoted thousands of hours seeking for beauty and meaning in the…
